ingredients.content: 50 g celery, cut in pieces (3 cm)
250 g ripe tomatoes, quartered, pulp and flesh separated

preparations.content: Place simmering basket on mixing bowl lid. Weigh in aubergines and salt, then leave for 10 minutes. Rinse aubergines under cold running water and set aside.
Place a bowl on mixing bowl lid. Weigh in flour and soya cream then remove and mix together with a fork.
Place onions, celery and olive oil in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Sauté <b>5 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.
Add wine, tomato pulp, courgettes, sugar, rosemary, stock, pepper and reserved aubergines then cook <b>5 min/100°C//speed <b>.
Add reserved tomato flesh and mushrooms then cook <b>7 min/100°C//speed <b>.
Add olives and reserved flour and cream mixture then cook <b>4 min/100°C//speed <b>. Serve immediately.
